overview.history: Established in 1992, the Shree Devi Education Trust(R.) was founded by a team of enlightened educationalists led by Sri A. Sadananda Shetty, a recipient of the Dakshina Kannada Rajyotsava award. It has grown to manage multiple professional colleges across various disciplines, including the Shree Devi Institute of Technology.
overview.vision: To provide quality education to enable the youth to become efficient professionals as well as upright citizens. The Trust aims to provide students with a rich and intense learning environment so that they acquire the knowledge and skills needed for succeeding in their professional as well as personal lives.
overview.mission: The mission is to provide excellence in engineering education and holistic development, managed under the Shree Devi Education Trust. It aims to be a strong base for numerous professional colleges catering to various streams.

note: This overview is compiled from available text fragments and search results. Vision and Mission statements are derived from multiple pages and may be slightly paraphrased or summarized.
